name: ramsey/uuid
description: A PHP 7 library for generating RFC 4122 version 1, 3, 4, and 5 universally unique identifiers (UUID).

suggest.ircmaxell/random-lib: Provides RandomLib for use with the RandomLibAdapter
suggest.ext-libsodium: Provides the PECL libsodium extension for use with the SodiumRandomGenerator
suggest.ext-uuid: Provides the PECL UUID extension for use with the PeclUuidTimeGenerator and PeclUuidRandomGenerator
suggest.ext-gmp: Provides support for converting UUID to 128-bit integer (in string form).
suggest.moontoast/math: Provides support for converting UUID to 128-bit integer (in string form).
suggest.ramsey/uuid-doctrine: Allows the use of Ramsey\Uuid\Uuid as Doctrine field type.
suggest.ramsey/uuid-console: A console application for generating UUIDs with ramsey/uuid
